duties_responsibilities.duty: Develops global clinical development vendor strategy for a program or therapeutic areas.
Manages contract and sourcing activities for clinical development programs providing consistent customer service and delivering quantitative value through cost savings and transformation/innovation.
Partners with internal customers in vendor bidding and proposal development (RFP creation and analysis).
Identifies, develops, and deploys best practices in vendor selection, cost containment, and category management practices.
Delivers value by developing business solutions by translating requirements into effective sourcing solutions, contractual terms, and process improvements.
Excellent communication skills and comfort level interacting with internal and external teams across all levels, including regular interface with stakeholders and leadership team members.

education_certification.credential: Relevant experience with a BA or MS in a relevant discipline (MBA or JD preferred)
PMP/CPSM certification or equivalent a plus
